thread.section_title: Bolt Depot Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bolt Depot | www.boltdepot.com
thread.title: Joshua Rimmer
thread.title_full: Bolt Depot reviewed by Joshua Rimmer

author: Joshua Rimmer
title: Joshua Rimmer
text: The one-piece-at-a-time ordering model, combined with reasonable shipping cost, makes it easy to build "kits" for my projects, without wasting money or time. The individually-labeled bags of hardware are excellent for finding the specific piece I need right now. I've use McMaster-Carr and Fastenal for most of my needs in the past, but not anymore!
